Patient: John Doe, MRN: 123456, DOB: 01/15/1960

Reason for Visit: Follow-up after cardiac cath

HPI: 64 yo M s/p PCI to LAD yesterday. Doing well, no chest pain, groin site intact without hematoma.

Physical Exam:
BP 128/76, HR 68, RR 14, SpO2 98%
Groin: No bleeding, no bruit, distal pulses intact
Heart: RRR, no murmurs
Lungs: Clear

Assessment:
S/P PCI to LAD - uncomplicated
Stable CAD
